studies.findings: Heart size within normal limits. No acute cardiopulmonary process. Lungs are clear bilaterally. No pleural effusion or pneumothorax.
Mild left atrial enlargement. Ejection fraction 55%. Mild mitral valve regurgitation. No significant wall motion abnormalities.
studies.impression: Mild left atrial enlargement, consistent with atrial fibrillation. Overall cardiac function preserved.
